resources.title: GoDaddy
resources.desc: GoDaddy is one of the oldest domain name registrars on the web.

resources.title: Vimly Digital
resources.desc: Vimly Digital is a small domain registar based in Durham, England. They pride themselves on providing the best prices on domains through over a dozen wholesalers.

resources.title: Namecheap
resources.desc: Namecheap is an affordable, modern domain name registrar, but they also include a number of other services. Check their site regularly because they frequently have big sales and discounts.

resources.title: Name.com
resources.desc: Name.com is an ICANN accredited domain name registrar and web hosting company based in Denver, Colorado.
